params._lpToken: Address of the LP ERC-20 token.

params.calls: An array of inputs for each call.
params.revertOnFail: If True then reverts after a failed call and stops doing further calls.

params.pid: The index of the pool. See `poolInfo`.

getRoleAdmin(bytes32).details: Returns the admin role that controls `role`. See {grantRole} and {revokeRole}. To change a role's admin, use {_setRoleAdmin}.

getRoleMember(bytes32,uint256).details: Returns one of the accounts that have `role`. `index` must be a value between 0 and {getRoleMemberCount}, non-inclusive. Role bearers are not sorted in any particular way, and their ordering may change at any point. WARNING: When using {getRoleMember} and {getRoleMemberCount}, make sure you perform all queries on the same block. See the following https://forum.openzeppelin.com/t/iterating-over-elements-on-enumerableset-in-openzeppelin-contracts/2296[forum post] for more information.

getRoleMemberCount(bytes32).details: Returns the number of accounts that have `role`. Can be used together with {getRoleMember} to enumerate all bearers of a role.

params.pid: The index of the pool. See `poolInfo`.

params.pids: Pool IDs of all to be updated. Make sure to update all active pools.

params._pid: The index of the pool. See `poolInfo`.
The index of the pool. See `poolInfo`.

returns.pending: Rara reward for a given user.

params._pid: The index of the pool. See `poolInfo`.
params.overwrite: True if _stakeManager should be `set`. Otherwise `_stakeManager` is ignored.

params._burnAddress: Address of the burner; the indicated Rara proportion will be transferred here (e.g. 0x0).
params._denominator: The share of all Rara out of which {_numerator} is burned. e.g. _numerator = 5, _denominator = 100 will burn 5%.
params._numerator: The share of emitted Rara to burn
params.overwrite: True if the _burnAddress should be set. Otherwise, `_burnAddress` is ignored.

params._lpToken: Address of the LP ERC-20 token.

params._pid: The index of the pool. See `poolInfo`.
params.overwrite: True if _stakeManager should be `set`. Otherwise `_stakeManager` is ignored.

params._burnAddress: Address of the burner; the indicated Rara proportion will be transferred here (e.g. 0x0).
params._denominator: The share of all Rara out of which {_numerator} is burned. e.g. _numerator = 5, _denominator = 100 will burn 5%.
params._numerator: The share of emitted Rara to burn
params.overwrite: True if the _burnAddress should be set. Otherwise, `_burnAddress` is ignored.

params.pid: The index of the pool. See `poolInfo`.

returns.pool: Returns the pool that was updated.

params.pid: The index of the pool. See `poolInfo`.
The index of the pool. See `poolInfo`.
params.to: Receiver of the LP tokens and RARA rewards.

totalAllocPoint.details: Total allocation points. Must be the sum of all allocation points in all pools.

totalStakedAllocPoint.details: Total staked allocation points. Must be the sum of all allocation points in all pools with nonzero stake.

add(uint256,address,address).notice: Add a new LP to the pool. Performs safety checks and data-integrity operations; this increases in complexity and will become unusable if the total number of pools grows. Switch to batch-execution of {updatePool} and {unsafeAdd} at that point.

batch(bytes[],bool).notice: Allows batched call to self (this contract).

burnAddress().notice: Burn address (address to receive burned Rara -- 0x0 default)

claimFromEmitter().notice: Claim any Rara owed from the emitter, transferring it into this contract. Called by this contract as-needed to fulfill Rara harvests, but can be triggered from outside to square accounts.

deposit(uint256,uint256,address).notice: Deposit LP tokens to RMP for RARA allocation.

harvest(uint256,address).notice: Harvest proceeds for transaction sender to `to`.

lpToken(uint256).notice: Address of the LP token for each RMP pool.

massUpdatePools(uint256[]).notice: Update reward variables for all pools. Be careful of gas spending!

migrate(uint256).notice: Migrate LP token to another LP contract through the `migrator` contract.

pendingReward(uint256,address).notice: View function to see pending Rara on frontend.

permitToken(address,address,address,uint.notice: Call wrapper that performs `ERC20.permit` on `token`. Lookup `IPermitERC20.permit`.

poolLength().notice: Returns the number of RMP pools.

set(uint256,uint256,address,bool).notice: Update the given pool's Rara allocation point and `IStakeManager`. Performs safety checks and data-integrity operations; this increases in complexity and will become unusable if the total number of pools grows. Switch to batch-execution of {updatePool} and {unsafeSet} at that point.

setBurnRate(uint256,uint256,address,bool.notice: Safely update the Rara burn rate.

setMigrator(address).notice: Set the `migrator` contract. Can only be called by the manager.

stakeManager(uint256).notice: Address of each `IStakeManager` contract in RMP.

totalReceived().notice: Calculates and returns the total Rara mined in the lifetime of this contract (including Rara that this contract burned)

unlockBlock().notice: Rara accumulates, but cannot be harvested before this block

unsafeAdd(uint256,address,address).notice: Unsafely add a new LP to the pool. Use in a batch after updating active pools. DO NOT add without {claimFromEmitter} and updating active pools. Rewards will be messed up if you do.

unsafeSet(uint256,uint256,address,bool).notice: Unsafely update the given pool's Rara allocation point and `IStakeManager`. DO NOT call without {claimFromEmitter} and updating active pools. Rewards will be messed up if you do.

unsafeSetBurnRate(uint256,uint256,addres.notice: Unsafely update the Rara burn rate. DO NOT call this function except as a batch starting with {claimFromEmitter}.

updatePool(uint256).notice: Update reward variables of the given pool.

userInfo(uint256,address).notice: Info of each user that stakes LP tokens.

withdrawAndHarvest(uint256,uint256,addre.notice: Withdraw LP tokens from RMP and harvest proceeds for transaction sender to `to`.
